dcterms:creator: Mor Geva
Jonathan Berant
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing question-answer pairs along with evidence documents, suitable for reading comprehension tasks. The documents are structured as trees, and the dataset is used to evaluate the ability of models to navigate through document structure to find answers.
dcterms:title: TRIVIAQA

dcterms:creator: Mor Geva
Jonathan Berant
dcterms:description: A modified version of TRIVIAQA where the preface section of each document is removed, encouraging more navigation through the document structure to find answers. This dataset is used to evaluate the ability of models to navigate through document structure when the answer is not immediately available in the initial sections.
dcterms:title: TRIVIAQA-NOP
